alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Laurens, northeastern Dodge, southwestern Treutlen and northwestern Wheeler Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 208 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Landsburg to Cedar Grove to near Plainfield, and moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cadwell, Lowery, Barnhill, Plainfield, Cedar Grove and Lothair. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
